ValidationRule.description: If Recording Type is Audio Only other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Recording_Type__c, 'Audio Only') && ISBLANK( HUB_URL__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Recording Type is Audio Only, then you must populate a value in the following fields: HUB URL
